item.title: Scope-aware Delegations in Distributed Social Networks
item.description:
• Approach to enable scope-aware delegations in distributed social networks using WebID
  • Enabling to outsource tasks in a controlled way to delegatee’s
  • Prevention of improper use of access rights by delegatee’s to allow more trustworthy collaboration
  • Prototypical implementation and integration into the WebID identity provider Soccidea
  • Publication of a scientific paper about the approach

item.title: Student Assistant
item.description:
• Supported researchers at the chair of “Distributed and Self-organizing Systems”
  • Development of approaches to enhance the information security in personal data management by web applications and web services
  • Concepts mainly based on WebID
  • Realization of an approach for scope-aware delegations based on WebID
  • Implementation of a code annotation tool to support the migration of legacy software
